intro: Gymnoluma glabrescens, commonly known as the smooth gymnoluma, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow in color. Gymnoluma glabrescens has simple, opposite leaves that are usually smooth and glossy. It is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as undergrowth in forests or along stream banks.
